greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of times 8 appears in decimal expansion of n.
example: a(0) = 0 since the decimal representation of 0 does not contain the digit 8.
a(8) = 1 since 8 appears once in the decimal expansion of 8.
results.author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jul 15 2018
